settings.journal_name_tag:
FAQ

Reach us Mon-Fri 10am-6pm care@auratenewyork.comfor any issues, problems and concerns.

settings.faq_description: We want you to be over the moon in love with your Aurate purchase (that’s why we started this company!). If you are not, for whatever reason, Aurate provides a 7 day one-time-only  exchange-for-credit  window on your engagement rings, starting from the day your item gets delivered.  If you decide your diamond isn’t for you, we’ll make it as easy as possible, just shoot us a note at concierge@auratenewyork.com to receive your free return shipping label. To be eligible for a return, the piece must be in its original condition and  sent back in its original packaging. Once we process your return,  you’re free to use your store credit on any other engagement piece that catches your eye.
settings.faq_title: What is your Exchange Policy on Engagement Rings?

settings.faq_description:
- Include all original documents in the package.

- Ship your package using our pre-paid return label. (DO NOT include additional Aurate products outside of the items listed in your return receipt.)

- Aurate cannot provide a credit on orders until they can be processed and inspected by our quality assurance team. Our team will contact you if any further details are needed.

**Aurate is not responsible for orders returned outside of our system or with personal labels.**

Exclusions

Sorry, no personalized or engraved jewelry can be exchanged at this time.
settings.faq_title: How do I prepare a return?

settings.faq_description: Use this link to help, or email us at concierge@auratenewyork.com
